sqlMap.sql:
SELECT SUBT1.LIC_GRP_ID , SUBT1.JEN_ID , SUBT1.JEN_NM , SUBT1.JEN_URL , SUBT1.JOB_ID , SUBT1.JOB_TYPE_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO( #licGrpId#, 'DPL00002', SUBT1.JOB_TYPE_CD, '1') AS JOB_TYPE_NM , SUBT1.JOB_RESTORE_ID , SUBT1.JOB_DESC , SUBT1.PRJ_ID , SUBT1.REG_DTM , SUBT1.REG_USR_ID , SUBT1.REG_USR_IP , SUBT1.MODIFY_DTM , SUBT1.MODIFY_USR_ID , SUBT1.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.JEN_ID , C.JEN_NM , C.JEN_URL , B.JOB_ID , B.JOB_TYPE_CD , B.JOB_RESTORE_ID , B.JOB_DESC , A.PRJ_ID , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM JEN1200 A LEFT JOIN JEN1100 B ON (A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID AND A.JOB_ID = B.JOB_ID) LEFT JOIN JEN1000 C ON (B.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND B.JEN_ID = C.JEN_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND UPPER( C.JEN_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( B.JOB_ID ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( B.JOB_RESTORE_ID ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND B.JOB_TYPE_CD LIKE '%'||#searchCd#||'%'
AND B.USE_CD LIKE '%'||#searchCd#||'%'
) SUBT1 ORDER BY SUBT1.JOB_ID

SELECT T.* , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO( #licGrpId#, 'DPL00002', T.JOB_TYPE_CD, '1') AS JOB_TYPE_NM FROM( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.JEN_ID , B.JEN_NM , B.JEN_URL , B.DEL_CD , A.JOB_ID , A.JOB_TYPE_CD , A.JOB_RESTORE_ID , A.JOB_DESC , A.USE_CD , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM JEN1100 A LEFT JOIN JEN1000 B ON (A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID) ) T WHERE 1=1 AND T.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND T.DEL_CD = '02' AND T.JOB_TYPE_CD != '03' AND T.USE_CD = '01' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT *FROM JEN1200 X WHERE 1=1 AND T.JEN_ID = X.JEN_ID AND T.JOB_ID = X.JOB_ID AND X.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND X.PRJ_ID = #prjId# )
AND UPPER( T.JEN_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( T.JOB_ID ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( T.JOB_RESTORE_ID ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( T.JOB_DESC ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND T.JOB_TYPE_CD LIKE '%'||#searchCd#||'%'
ORDER BY T.JOB_ID

SELECT SUBT1.LIC_GRP_ID , SUBT1.PRJ_ID , SUBT1.JEN_ID , SUBT1.JOB_ID , SUBT1.AUTH_GRP_ID , SUBT1.AUTH_GRP_NM , SUBT1.AUTH_GRP_DESC , SUBT1.CREATE_DT , SUBT1.USE_CD , SUBT1.USR_TYP , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO( #licGrpId#, 'ADM00004', SUBT1.USR_TYP, '1') AS USR_TYP_NM FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID , A.JEN_ID , A.JOB_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_ID , B.AUTH_GRP_NM , B.AUTH_GRP_DESC , B.CREATE_DT , B.USE_CD , B.USR_TYP FROM JEN1300 A INNER JOIN ADM1100 B ON (A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = B.AUTH_GRP_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# AND B.USE_CD = '01' ) SUBT1
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, T.* FROM (
) T ) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, T.* FROM (
) T ) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO JEN1200 ( LIC_GRP_ID, PRJ_ID, JEN_ID, JOB_ID , REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, #prjId#, #jenId#, #jobId# , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM JEN1200 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT ROWNUM RN, T.* FROM (
) T

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, T.* FROM (
) T ) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) AS AUTH_GRP_CNT FROM JEN1300 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO JEN1300 ( LIC_GRP_ID, PRJ_ID, JEN_ID, JOB_ID , AUTH_GRP_ID, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, #prjId#, #jenId#, #jobId# , #authGrpId#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM JEN1300 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId#
AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE JEN1100 SET JOB_RESTORE_ID = null WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND JEN_ID = #jenId# AND JOB_RESTORE_ID = #jobId#
